photoalbum.model

Class Photo

  • java.lang.Object
    • photoalbum.model.Photo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Photo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a photo. A photo is not unique, and there can be multiple photo objects pointing to the same file on the filesystem.
    Author:
    Paul Warner & Kenny Zhang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
